&  SYSTEM  Five (5) credit passes at SSC or 
equivalent, in Mathematics, English 
Language and any other three (3)  
relevant subjects.  
  
Same as in Electrical Electronics 
Engineering in Polytechnics.  
  
UTME  
i.  DALEWARES considers a pass in 
Physics or Chemistry at ‘O’ level. ii) 
FCTI accepts credit passes in two (2) 
Arts or Social Science subjects.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
i.   KSITM accepts any three (3) 
subjects.
